prompt: Consider a two-dimensional triangular lattice with a mean-field Hamiltonian described in momentum space. The Brillouin zone of this lattice forms a hexagon. What are the coordinates of the six Brillouin zone corners ($K$ and $K'$ points) for this lattice structure? Round your answers to 2 decimal places, and separate all these coordinates with a comma, like (x1,y1), (x2,y2), ...
